noDataMessage: We’re still learning your flow patterns. Keep recording your sessions, and we’ll provide personalized analysis soon.

interruptions.unlocks: leaving the app during the timer
interruptions.scrolls: doing other activities during the timer

danger: flow stability is at high risk.
your flow level is very low.
maintaining flow is difficult right now.
your flow state is dropping sharply.
stable: you’re sustaining a solid flow state.
good: your flow level is very strong.
your flow state is near peak.

excellent: aim to keep your flow at this level.
continue performing at a high flow level.
risingStable: You're steadily improving. As you get more comfortable, try extending your flow sessions little by little.
Great upward trend. Make it a goal to gradually increase your session length.
You're making good progress. It might be a good time to start lengthening your flow sessions step by step.
You're heading in the right direction. Try increasing your flow duration gradually.
stableHigh: continue maintaining a strong flow state.
minorImprovement: reduce {{issue}} slightly to refine your flow.
a small adjustment to {{issue}} will bring you closer to optimal.
reducing {{issue}} a bit will strengthen your flow overall.
addressing {{issue}} will further improve your flow.
risingMedium: You're showing improvement! Try extending your flow sessions step by step.
Good progress. Gradually increase your session length as you build momentum.
You're on the right track. Extend your flow time little by little.
Positive trend. Work on lengthening your flow periods progressively.
risingWithTip: lower '{{issue}}' further to support the trend (avg {{count}} times).
noIssue: challenge yourself with longer flow durations.
aim to lengthen your flow time now.
singleIssue: primary disruption: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—work on reducing this.
'{{issue}}' is impacting your flow sessions (avg {{count}} times)—address this factor.
loss of flow is mostly linked to '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times).
main disruption detected: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—prioritize improvement here.
multiIssue: address '{{issue1}}' (avg {{count1}}) and '{{issue2}}' (avg {{count2}}) to improve flow stability.
lower both '{{issue1}}' (avg {{count1}}) and '{{issue2}}' (avg {{count2}}) for better flow.
lowScoreNoIssue: increase your flow duration step by step.
extend flow periods progressively to build stamina.
add a few more minutes to each flow session.
lowScoreWithIssue: your main challenge is '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—tackle this first.
lower the impact of '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) to improve flow.
